ch0017_90_leaf/0101_0701_01_10:
Heya, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! How’s your
partner Pokémon doing today?
ch0017_90_leaf/0101_0701_02_10:
We’re at the top of our game, too! We’re totally
ready for adventure!
ch0017_90_leaf/7101_0701_01_10:
Sometimes I like to look back at the path I’ve
taken on this journey.
ch0017_90_leaf/7101_0701_02_10:
I’m the person I am today because of all the
people I met and battles I’ve had.
ch0017_90_leaf/7101_0701_03_10:
When I think about things that way, it makes me
want to cherish each day...
ch0017_90_leaf/7102_0701_02_10: I have a hard time deciding which I like more!
ch0017_90_leaf/7102_0701_03_10:
A cute Pokémon that makes me want to protect
it...or a cool Pokémon I can depend on... Hmmm.
I can’t decide!
ch0017_90_leaf/7103_0701_01_10:
There’s a tale about how Moltres once lit up a
mountain trail at night and saved someone who
was lost.
ch0017_90_leaf/7103_0701_02_10:
I also want to guide everyone so they don’t lose
their way—so they can become a Trainer others
can look up to!
ch0017_90_leaf/7104_0701_01_10:
I always feel so warm and relaxed next
to Moltres!
ch0017_90_leaf/7104_0701_02_10: I want to pet it, but I’d probably get burnt, huh.
ch0017_90_leaf/7105_0701_01_10:
You and your partner Pokémon keep getting
stronger, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0017_90_leaf/7105_0701_02_10:
Whenever we team up in battle, I feel I can really
depend on you!
ch0017_90_leaf/7105_0701_03_10: Hmm, maybe that’s why I feel I can’t lose to you!
ch0017_90_leaf/7105_0701_04_10: Even when it comes to my love of Pokémon!
ch0017_90_leaf/1701_0701_01_10: Oh, great timing! I wanted to give you this!
ch0017_90_leaf/2501_0701_01_10: My journey started in Pallet Town...
ch0017_90_leaf/2501_0701_02_10:
And I got to meet a lot of amazing people and
Pokémon—not just from Kanto but from all over
the world!
ch0017_90_leaf/2501_0701_03_10:
So many things shine so bright when I’m
with Pokémon!
ch0017_90_leaf/2501_0702_01_10:
Battling with you is something I’ll always
remember!
ch0017_90_leaf/2501_0702_02_10: I’ll never forget all the memories I made on Pasio!
ch0017_90_leaf/2511_0701_01_10:
Only those who truly love Pokémon can become
a Champion!
ch0017_90_leaf/2511_0701_02_10:
Don’t forget the importance of treating your
Pokémon with trust and love!
ch0017_90_leaf/2511_0701_03_10:
I’m just repeating something Professor Oak
told me...
ch0017_90_leaf/2511_0701_04_10: But it seems you don’t need reminding!
ch0017_90_leaf/2511_0702_01_10:
I’m gonna pour all my love into my battles,
just like a Neo Champion of Pasio should...
ch0017_90_leaf/3001_0701_01_10:
Morning! Let’s shake off the sleepiness and fire up
our day!
ch0017_90_leaf/3003_0701_01_10:
Let’s do as much as we can while the sun is out so
we get even stronger!
ch0017_90_leaf/3005_0701_01_10:
You sure worked hard today! How do you feel?
Did you have any satisfying Pokémon battles?
